summary: This project enhances MkDocs documentation with AI-driven summary generation and reading statistics. It features multi-AI service integration, automatic summary generation, multi-language support, content cleaning, and intelligent caching. Additionally, it offers intelligent reading statistics with character counting, code detection, and reading time estimation. The system is environment-adaptive, supports multiple languages, and provides content type detection. Installation can be done via direct download or Git clone, with configuration steps outlined for quick setup.
